FunctionalRequirements.Name: Health Monitoring and Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide users with daily health reminders for medication and health check-ins using simple voice commands, ensuring clarity and ease of understanding.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Customizable Privacy Settings
FunctionalRequirements.Description: Users shall be able to customize their privacy settings to control what personal information and health data are shared with caregivers and how it is utilized, with clear explanations provided in accessible language.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Cognitive Support Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall send gentle reminders for daily tasks, appointments, and engaging brain exercises tailored to the user's preferences, enhancing cognitive functioning without overwhelming them.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Community Event Notifications
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide users with subtle notifications about nearby community events and activities that align with their interests, fostering social connections while respecting their need for independence.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Activity Tracking and Reporting
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to set personal activity goals and receive periodic summaries of their physical activity levels, ensuring they can track their progress without daily prompts.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: User Interface Design
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall feature a well-designed user interface that is intuitive and easy to navigate for older adults with varying technical abilities, ensuring a positive user experience.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Data Security Compliance
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall comply with relevant data privacy regulations to ensure the security of user information and health data, fostering user trust and confidence in the platform.
